mapper.insert: INSERT INTO out(id, playerId, reason, createdAt) VALUES(stadium_seq.nextval, #{playerId}, #{reason}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT rownum no, o.* FROM (SELECT o.id, o.playerId, reason, o.createdAt, p.name, p.teamId, p.position, t.name teamName FROM out o INNER JOIN player p ON o.playerId=p.id INNER JOIN team t ON p.teamId=t.id ORDER BY p.name) o
mapper.update: UPDATE out SET reason = #{reason} WHERE id = #{id}
